snippet.title: Cerebral - Official Reveal Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
First official trailer of Cerebral, an innovative game from Youviverse Games. Currently in early development stages. Please follow us on our social media channels and stay tuned for latest news and updates. 
We'd be very happy to hear your thoughts on our game.

Website: https://youviverse.com/cerebral
Twitter: https://twitter.com/youviverse/

--

Cerebral is a non-linear psychological horror game set in an ever-changing residential tower. Distinguish reality from illusion and survive this endless mind-bending nightmare, but death is not the end.

Cerebral is not a common survival horror to hide, escape and repeat. 
We're talking about a unique aspect of horror games that sometimes failure is the only key to success.

--

Features:

Replayability: Similar to rogue-lite games, after each death, you wake up to a new level with new details but not random. It's based on your choices and achievements in the previous loop. So every playthrough feels like a fresh start with many secrets and surprises.

Over 30 Endings: Every choice matters, even little ones. If you don't put enough effort into Cerebral, you won't see satisfying endings. We challenge you to unlock all of them as well as the secret ending!

True Horror: No cheap jump scares! Instead, We've implemented tension and fear of the unknown to give you the best horror experience.

Outstanding Gameplay: The gameplay is all about tough decisions and dying. Unlike most video games, you should both fear death and want it because it's the only way to progress further in the game. If the character dies, you'll miss some opportunities but also achieve new ones.
